parameters: Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
Please take care of my daughter...

If you need anything, feel free to call out to me
anytime.

Come to think of it, there's been a strangely dull
guy hanging around with my daughter lately. Do you
happen to know anything about it?
もしかしたら付き合ってるのかも
That guy doesn't have any sense of responsibility.
Yeah, sorry for asking weird things.

Hey, welcome. It looks like Margaret is doing her
best too.
I'm sorry I can't help with the shop.

What are you saying? Is it for the sake of your
friend?

The shop can take a backseat, \n[1]-kun. I've also
asked my daughter for help.
He nodded strongly and said Leave it to me.

Alright! That's the spirit of a man! I'm counting
on you.
If you need anything, feel free to ask me anytime.
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
If you need anything, feel free to ask me anytime.

Come to think of it, there's a strangely dull guy
hanging around with my daughter lately. Do you
happen to know anything about it?
もしかしたら付き合ってるのかも
That guy doesn't have any sense of responsibility.
Yeah, sorry for asking weird things.
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
Please take care of my daughter...

If you need anything, feel free to call out to me
anytime.
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
Both of you, don't push yourselves too hard.
When you want to buy something, ask Papa for help.
...Sorry, can I consult with you before shopping?

Lately, there have been many vague memories, and
before I know it, there's a big brother figure
right there beside me.

I feel sluggish and like something might be
happening to my body.

...Sorry, I shouldn't be doubting people, should
I?
You can forget about what I just said.
...If everything looks good, feel free to buy it.
...Thank you, but keep the price as it is.

Is that so? If anything happens, feel free to call
out to me anytime.
I want to be as helpful as possible
When you want to buy something, ask Papa for help.
Both of you, please come in.

Please briefly explain to Margaret what has
happened so far.

I see...that something like that happened to
Light.

I want to help too, but for now, I have to take
over the store in place of my father.
Is it okay for me to receive this much!?

Don't worry, I'll talk to my father about it
later.

Both of you, please take care. If something
happens to either of you, not just Light... I'd
hate it.

Yeah! I got it! \n[1] may be a little unreliable
normally, but when it's time to step up, he really
does.

You know! Just earlier, when we were about to go
to a dangerous ruins...

Interrupting Lira's story, Margaret expresses her
gratitude.

Mo-! You don't have to be embarrassed, Margaret-
chan. Thank you!
Margaret is as cute as ever, huh.

I still can't believe I'm the one touching those
unbelievable breasts.

I wonder what \n[1] thinks? Well, it doesn't really
matter anymore.

I wonder if Margaret is free today. When should I
try talking to her...

Today, I'll make Margaret-chan feel good again.
Ah, I'm looking forward to it.
Unfortunately, she still hasn't been found.

I see...please, somehow find her as soon as
possible...

I'll do this, so please find my daughter by any
means necessary.

It seems to be a popular item in the capital, so
please consider it as an addition. It's apparently
the top recommendation of a merchant who came
today.

I'll do this for free, so please rely on me for my
daughter...
Hey, here comes an unimpressive-looking guy...

Hey, this is always the tool shop's warehouse,
don't just come in here on your own!

I've said it many times, but Margaret-chan is
mine. Stop getting in the way!
Hey, say something to Margaret-chan too.

Margaret seems to be at a loss for words too. If
you understand, then hurry up and leave. Ugh, it's
so frustrating...

You have a troubled look on your face, is
something the matter?
He did as he pleased with me, and that's not okay.

But I know, his feelings that resonated in my
heart were pure love.

He must be a weak person, lacking in self-
confidence and always carrying anxiety. That's why
he ended up relying on cowardly tactics.

I can't blame him, maybe I'm being a little too
lenient.

I'm sure he just buttoned up wrong... I want to
fix that for him.
Let's try talking to him, then surely...
Sorry, just thinking a bit... Don't worry.

It seems she's concentrating, let's leave her
alone.
Are you ready in your heart?
あ、いえ、まだちょっと・・・

It seems like she's still lost in thought. I
wonder if there's anything I can do to help?

Let her know that if Margaret is in trouble, she
should feel free to consult with you.
Um... Have you ever liked someone, \n[1]?

I'm sorry, I was worried about that and it
surprised me.
Yeah... I feel the same way...

I wonder what I want to do when I have no choice
but to think for myself...
Honestly, I'll let you know if I don't understand.

But, I talked about my thoughts on love in my own
words.
\n[1], I think that's how it is with love.

\n[1] gave me his own words in response to my vague
question.

\n[1] gave me his own words in response to my vague
question, carefully choosing his words as if love
is something that comes after various
accumulations.

When I heard that story, what came to mind were
the memories with \n[1] and everyone.

If I were to experience the warmth and comfort of
love, surely those feelings would well up within
me.

I'll make sure to tell Onii-san properly that
right now, I don't really understand you.
Thank you, \n[1]. I'm glad I consulted with you.

If I were to fall in love... it might be with
\n[1].

...Joking around like that, blushing so much, you
pervert.

It seems she's concentrating, let's leave her
alone.
...How's it going, \n[1]? Have you found the girl?
Unfortunately, she still hasn't been found.

How was the crystal I gave you before? If you
haven't obtained a new one, please bring it to me.

I'm counting on you. You're the only one I can
rely on...

Margaret, don't push yourself too hard. It's just
today after all...

If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime,
okay?

events.name: マーガレット　確定１

parameters:
It seems like your body isn't feeling well. You
look a little pained.

Hmm...I'm okay...but, it seems like exploring will
be difficult. I'm sorry.
I'm telling you not to overdo it.
Yeah, today, \n[1] will help me out.
Of course, Margaret. Tell me anything I can do!

\n[1], that's why I don't want you to worry about
me...thank you.
Can you leave this item over there, big brother?
Haa... I wonder what will become of him.

Oh, \n[1] was here... I thought it was you, Light.
But I guess there's no helping it once it's
passed.
Hey, welcome. What do you need today?
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?

...Hm? Have you seen Margaret? Come to think of
it, I haven't seen her since yesterday.
Well, I'd say she's probably at his place...

If you find her, tell \n[1] that he's been looking
for her. Good luck with the search.
Hey, welcome! What do you need today?
